creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black cotton center has circle of floral embroidered appliques in pink, red, blue and aqua linked together; metallic tape and metal mirror studs; see-through white petals around orange center with bird embroidery; pink and aqua corner triangles and pink and blue borders have playful fauna and flora embroidery; red print commercial lining
medium: Cotton, silk, metallic tape, studs; needlework
title: Baby Carrier
